description: Capacity allocation and availability for a time-based slot.

resourceId.description: Specific resource identifier, if capacity is scoped to a single asset.

totalCapacity.description: Total capacity units for the slot.

reservedCapacity.description: Capacity already reserved for confirmed/held bookings.

availableCapacity.description: Remaining capacity available for new bookings.

capacityUnit.description: Unit of measure for the capacity (TEU, moves, appointments).

notes.description: Operational notes or exceptions for the slot.
